text: Gregory John Page, AM (born 16 January 1972) is an Australian singer, musician and actor. He is best known as the original lead singer and a founding member of the children's band The Wiggles from 1991 to 2006 and then again in 2012. Page has also recorded several solo albums. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 births Category:Actors from Sydney Category:Musicians from Sydney Category:Australian singers Category:Australian guitarists Category:Multi-instrumentalists Category:Order of Australia Category:Living people
title: Greg Page (musician)
